game.name: Food Magician
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Food Magician is an fantasy action-adventure game that filled with hidden treasures, dangerous creatures, and ancient ruins. With stunning graphics and beautiful music, Food Magician features various gameplay mechanics, including real-time combat, traps, and puzzle-solving.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Food Magician is an fantasy action-adventure game that filled with hidden treasures, dangerous creatures, and ancient ruins. With stunning graphics and beautiful music, Food Magician features various gameplay mechanics, including real-time combat, traps, and puzzle-solving.
